verses.text: And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* in his \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add was\add* with him, and \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w* him \w exceedingly|strong="H4605"\w*.

Then \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, to the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* and of \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, and to the \w judges|strong="H8199"\w*, and to every \w governor|strong="H5387"\w* in all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

So \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, and all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* with him, \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to the high \w place|strong="H1116"\w* that \add was\add* at \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*; for there was the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w made|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0061"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w David|strong="H1732"\w* brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Kirjath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w* to \add the place which\add* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* had \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* for it: for he had \w pitched|strong="H5186"\w* a \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* for it at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

Moreover the \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, that \w Bezaleel|strong="H1212"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uri|strong="H0221"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w*, had \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, he \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* and the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* unto it.\f + \fr 1.5 \ft he put: or, was there\f*

And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* thither to the \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which \add was\add* at the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* upon it.

¶ In that \w night|strong="H3915"\w* did \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* unto \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Ask|strong="H7592"\w* what I shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee.

And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, Thou hast \w shewed|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and hast made me to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

Now, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, let thy \w promise|strong="H1697"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* be \w established|strong="H0539"\w*: for thou hast made me \w king|strong="H4427"\w* over a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* like the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* in \w multitude|strong="H7227"\w*.\f + \fr 1.9 \ft like…: Heb. much as the dust of the earth\f*

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* me now \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* and \w knowledge|strong="H4093"\w*, that I may go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* and come \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: for who can \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* this thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add that is so\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*?

And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, Because this was in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and thou hast not \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*, \w wealth|strong="H5233"\w*, or \w honour|strong="H3519"\w*, nor the \w life|strong="H5315"\w* of thine \w enemies|strong="H8130"\w*, neither yet hast \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w long|strong="H7227"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*; but hast \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* and \w knowledge|strong="H4093"\w* for thyself, that thou mayest \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, over whom I have made thee \w king|strong="H4427"\w*:

\w Wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* and \w knowledge|strong="H4093"\w* \add is\add* \w granted|strong="H5414"\w* unto thee; and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*, and \w wealth|strong="H5233"\w*, and \w honour|strong="H3519"\w*, such as none of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* have had that \add have been\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, neither shall there any \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee have the like.

¶ Then \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \add from his journey\add* to the high \w place|strong="H1116"\w* that \add was\add* at \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* and \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*: and he had a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, which he \w placed|strong="H3240"\w* in the \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and with the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \add as plenteous\add* as \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and cedar \w trees|strong="H0730"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* he as the sycomore \w trees|strong="H8256"\w* that \add are\add* in the \w vale|strong="H8219"\w* for \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*.\f + \fr 1.15 \ft made: Heb. gave\f*

And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w brought|strong="H4161"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and linen \w yarn|strong="H4723"\w*: the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w merchants|strong="H5503"\w* \w received|strong="H3947"\w* the linen \w yarn|strong="H4723"\w* at a \w price|strong="H4242"\w*.\f + \fr 1.16 \ft Solomon…: Heb. the going forth of the horses which was Solomon’s\f*

And they fetched \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* a \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* for \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \add shekels\add* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and an \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* for an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*: and so brought they \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \add horses\add* for all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, and for the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, by their \w means|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 1.17 \ft means: Heb. hand\f*
